CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Fact_Sales_4](
	[transaction_id] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[transactional_date] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[product_id] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[customer_id] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[payment] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[credit_card] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[loyalty_card] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[cost] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[quantity] [nvarchar](max) NULL,
	[price] [nvarchar](max) NULL
)
